description:
We are seeking a Benefits Manager to join our Remote team. You will be responsible for helping customers by providing insurance product and service information on their permanent coverage from their employer. We work with all major organizations across the US including the firefighters, teachers, & veterans. The ideal candidate is results-driven, hungry for customer acquisition, and passionate about growth.

Qualifications:

  • Previous experience in customer service, sales, or other related fields
  • Ability to build rapport with clients
  • Ability to prioritize and multitask
  • Positive and professional demeanor
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Able to efficiently use Zoom
  • Reps Can expect:
  • Members are provided by company/ No cold calling or self prospecting
  • Residual Income ( Passive income)
  • In house training (experience is not required)
  • Weekly Advance and Bonus ( commission)
  • Stock options
  • Benefits
  • Quarterly incentive trips
  • Quick development into leadership role if desired

Responsibilities:

  • Handle customer inquiries and qualifications
  • Provide information about the products and services
  • Build and maintain relationships with new members as well as existing
  • Obtain license to be able to service our members
